Description: Imported guitar 7 years ago in 2011, Gold hardware. Custom Black Beauty triple pick up with Gold Bigsby tremolo. Gold roller bridge, comes with mother of pearl lettering on headstock. Ever wanted an amazing guitar that didn't cost 5,000.00 , but also didn't sound like a cheap import? You can now have a guitar that sounds and looks like the real thing. How? Get a beautiful carved top black beauty Guitar, strip it down of all imported hardware to body and neck. Install all Genuine Gibson pots, wiring, bridge, tailpiece, and genuine vintage Sprague capacitors. Refit and engineer the neck to install Genuine Grover tuners. Amazing guitar tone with Gibson USA BurstBuckers - BB1 neck, BB2 middle, and BB3 bridge pick up. Have it professionally checked and set up. The Guitar has been stored in Hard shell for most of its years. Has a few finish swirls and some light scratches. However, Looks fabulous, Sounds amazing, and plays as it should. All guitars feel different to different people, so I can't say its for you. For the price, you can love it. Comes in beautiful locking imported Hard Case. Black carved top Custom Standard binding and Black Finish Standard Custom headstock with mother of pearl lettering / Custom truss rod cover Neck BurstBucker 1 Middle BurstBucker 2Bridge BurstBucker 3 Gold Grover tuners Gold roller Bridge and Bigsby Tremolo Gold strapsInstalled Gold Mirror Pick GuardPearlized TrapezoidsGold custom knobs No Claim is made that this used imported guitar is a Gibson USA.
Title: 2011 LP Standard Black Beauty Guitar Bigsby Gibson
ConditionDescription: Used in excellent condition with some swirls and light scratches.
